EDUCATION.Institute Name: Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology, Bhubaneswar

PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
As a summer internship project, we built a web application to help the people working in Accounts Receivable departments in their day to day activities. By help of this web application, the users in the Account Receivable department can :
●View the invoice data from various buyers
●See various fields / attributes of the invoice(s) from a particular buyer 
●Perform searching and sorting on the invoices
●Get a prediction of when the invoice is going to get paid

It is basically a virtual assistant with speech recognition. It can do basic stuff that a single user  do in their day to day life; like, 
*Opening the browser and search something and then close the browser 
*Reading the news headlines
*Reading the information about any topics from Wikipedia.
*Opening file explorer
*Time and weather information.
*Email to a specific person.
*It can lock, sign out, restart and shutdown the pc.
etc.
It also has some basic security features like user login & permissions.
This can be used to find product lists from Amazon or Flipkart and send a CSV file to user in email.
E-commerce Site with management of cart
